about_the_game:
This DLC adds a series of operations set in Western Europe in 1944-45 where your battle group will engage Allied forces advancing from Normandy to, and beyond, the Rhine. Each operation will consist of three battles and can be played individually or added to a Grand Campaign encompassing the entire war. These operations include:

i. Operation Cobra – the American breakout from Normandy in the direction of Avranches on the Atlantic coast.

ii. British, Canadian, and Polish advance to form the northern pincer that closed the Falaise Pocket. This operation begins with the British and Canadian advance to seize Verrieres Ridge south of Caen, then continues with the Polish advance south towards Falaise, and ends with American, Canadian, and Polish units blocking the German exit from the Falaise Pocket.

iii. Operation Pheasant – the British, Canadian, and Polish advance into the Netherlands.

iv. Battle of The Bulge – the German attempt to break through American lines in the Ardennes for an advance towards the English Channel

v. The American advance across the Rhine to form the northern pincer of the Ruhr pocket.
